front.title: Supporting Mobility for TCP with SIP

abstract.t: This document proposes an approach for using SIP to support mobilityfor TCP-based applications in a mobile Internet. The proposedapproach utilizes a TCP tracking agent, dubbed as SIP_EYE, in mobilestations as well as SIP INFO method to spoof constant endpoints formobile TCP connections and supports mobile TCP applications in a SIPenvironment without any changes to TCP.
